description: Addictive learning game pits man versus machine. Who's smarter? Search bots find answers. Guess the question. Did the robots show smart clues? Beat the 5 minute timer.   Game pack provides the following: - Flow selector for accessing chapters - Classic match and slots games for associating images with terms - Innovative Pictionary with a search-bot for testing comprehension - Slow spelling of the answer, letter every 5 seconds - Image results from Google, Bing, and Yahoo - Clue with meaning or context - Flow selector for selecting terms without typing  Join the excitement of the World Cup football/soccer in South Africa.
